transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Vinod bhai, Hanuman baat kar raha hu main doctor se liya main aapke. Haan ji, vahi ja rahi hai meri.

Customer: Haan haan. Ji Vinod bhai, aapne 9696 pe call kar diya kya?

Customer: Haan, usme aapke call pe usme bataya tha ki unreachable bata raha tha to main kaha theek hai isi pe call kiya. Message bhi drop kar dete maine bataya na aapko, koi bhi communication mere paas yeh hai. Nahi nahi usme unreachable bata raha tha, unreachable.

Executive: Okay nahi message bhi drop kar diya kare. Hota hai yeh network issue ki vajah se ho jata hai kabhi kabhi.

Executive: Baki bataunga ji Vinod bhai.

Customer: Ah, main yeh keh raha tha ki isme jo leads vagarah jo show ho rahi hai mujhe.

Customer: To iska same hi, same hi issue aa raha hai jo pehle jo aa raha tha.

Customer: Matlab mujhe abhi main yeh keh raha hu mujhe mahina bhar ho gaya isko notice karte hue mujhe ek bhi lead nahi mili hai is mahine ke andar. Ek minute iske andar main work karta hu.
Speaker: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Speaker: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki

Customer: Haan ji Vinod bhai ab batao aap mujhe.

Customer: Main yeh keh raha hu ki main morning kar leta hu.

Customer: Meeting arrange to kar lenge lekin us meeting se fayda kya padega mujhe yeh bataiye. Haan.

Customer: Woh main chahta hu kaun sa buylead nahi aa raha hai matlab irrelevant aa raha hai buylead ki ya relevant hi nahi aa raha hai.

Customer: Koi bhi nahi aa raha hai, koi usme puri maine is mahine pura notice kiya hai mujhe is maine pichli wali aap lead check karo usme puri leads lead nahi hai aur abhi wali hogi woh bhi aise hi chali jayegi.

Customer: Kyuki isme aapke maine is mahine ke andar pura total dekha hai is mahine mein ek bhi lead aisi nahi hai jiske upar main call kar saku.

Executive: Relevant matlab kaam ka hi nahi aa raha hai yeh bol rahe hai aap?

Customer: Matlab iska kaam aisa ki iske andar leads aa rahi hai 100 kilo, 200 kilo, 50 kilo, 10 kilo.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Yeh keh raha hu main. All over India ka mere ko yeh show kar raha hai.

Customer: Fir aap keh rahe ho ki aap jaise leads le to leads show hi aisi ho rahi hai to lu kaise main?

Customer: Aur jabki past lead ke andar check kiya jisme kabhi 60-60 ton, 7-7 ton, 11-11 ton, 10-10 ton, 11-100-100 ton ke bhi order aa rahe hai lekin uske baad click karunga to show hi nahi hoti. Na koi mujhe leads ka notification aa raha hai, na koi nayi lead aayi hai uska notification aa raha hai, kisi ka kuch pata nahi hai.

Customer: Jab check karta hu tab to kuch hota nahi hai.

Customer: Isme aisa thodi ki kisi aur ne lead li to woh lead gayab ho jayegi.

Executive: Nahi woh sold out ho jati hai sir maine bataya na, pan India level pe.

Customer: Sold out ho jati hai to yeh aapne pehle kyu nahi bataya ki sold out ho jati hai?

Executive: Sir yeh to maine us time bhi bataya aapko. Jab meri baat hui thi tab maine yeh discuss kara tha aapke sath.

Customer: Nahi nahi lead aap keh rahe ho ki lead jo banda agar aisa hai ki all over India mein jo lead aayi hai jis bande ke paas 60 ton ka order hai, zaruri thodi hai ki uske baad usne lead li hai to woh lead matlab usne uska woh buyer confirm ho gaya.

Executive: Main batata hu na dobara aapko. Uske baad woh competitive ho gaye na, yeh to fir competitive ho gaya jisne pehle liya uski hui woh to.

Executive: Sir bata to raha hu aap sunit to lijiye Vinod bhai. Yeh maine I think pehle bhi discuss kara tha ek bhi buylead.

Customer: Nahi nahi pehle discuss dekho jis din, jis din maine suno suno ek baat suno. Jis din maine subscription liya tha us din mein mujhe maine unko bola tha main ke agar main lead leta hu to woh lead gayab to nahi hogi ke nahi nahi sir woh to hamesha rehti hai aap usko call kar sakte ho koi bhi kar sakta hai.

Customer: Main kaha theek hai aisa hai to theek hai aur aapne bhi pehle bataya tha ke sir 4 ghante ke andar andar load jo bhi lead aati hai kyuki baki logo ko usme zyada calls aa jate hai to zyada calls kam aa rahe hai jab aap keh rahe ho ek lead lete hi gayab ho gayi lead.

Executive: IndiaMART se dobara samjha deta hu dobara Vinod bhai. IndiaMART se.

Customer: Fir dobara mere ko samjhane ka zarurat nahi hai mere ko, mere ko yeh batao ki pehle jo bola ab jo bola ke do-do baatein hoti hai.

Executive: Dono baatein mein same similar hi bolne wala hu abhi bhi. Ek baar sunenge sahi aapko.

Customer: Fir dekho pehle kya bola tha pehle maine dekho jinhone mere ko subscription dilaya unse bhi maine baat kari thi ke unhone bhi yahi kaha tha ke nahi lead kahan gayab hoti hai lead kahan nahi jati. Kya hai jis bande ne li hai uska zaruri nahi hota ke uska buyer confirm ho jaye woh lead to baki, baki logo ke liye bhi available hoti hai. Ab aap yeh keh rahe ho lead, lead jo banda leta hai woh sold out ho jati hai. To yeh to fir competitive hua na jo banda agar jo, jo banda baitha hai usko apne.

Executive: Ji boliye Vinod bhai aap hi bol dijiye. Tabhi to main agar nahi sunenge to main kaise bata paunga aapko.

Customer: Nahi nahi batao batao kyuki bata ke kuch change to ho nahi raha pichli baar bhi aap bata rahe ke meeting arrange vagarah bhi aap mere ko.

Executive: Change hoga na sir.

Executive: Change hoga us, us cheez mein change hoga na jab aap sunenge sir.

Customer: Haan haan samjha.

Executive: Tabhi to improve aayega. Aisa to hai nahi aap bol rahe aur woh change ho jayega ekdum se.

Customer: Jab tak aap sunenge nahi.

Customer: Nahi ekdum se change nahi. Dekho ek, dekho ek cheez maine pehle bhi kaha tha ki mere ko leads ka na to koi notification aa raha hai na koi nayi lead aayi hai uska notification aa raha hai to kya lead kab aayegi mujhe kya dhyan padega pure din to main online rehne se raha ispe.

Executive: Sir online rehna bhi nahi hai wohi to main samjhane ki koshish kar raha hu. Aapka jo

Customer: Iska main, suno suno iska main, iska main aapko meri history bata deta hu notification ki. Theek hai iske andar ek bhi notification aaya nahi mere ko isme.

Executive: Aapka mail check karta hai?

Customer: Are mail, mail to jab check karenge tab uspe aayega kuch bhi. Jab main buyer, main purchase kar raha hu na lead tab mere ko notification aa raha hai ki aapne yeh lead purchase ki.

Customer: Baki mere ko koi notification nahi aa raha hai ki baki kisi, baki kisi cheez ka mere ko notification nahi aa raha hai.

Executive: Ek baar video meet kar lenge sir waha pe main aapko showcase kara deta hu main pura.

Executive: Saari cheeze.

Customer: Video meet se hoga kya mujhe to pata nahi hai kyuki pichle bhi teen char baar to apan video meet hi kar rahe hai kuch farak to pad nahi raha hai.

Executive: Sir ek baar yeh confusion jo hai na jo aap bol rahe hai uska resolution to provide karaunga na main one to one hi aapko behtar resolution mil payega na.

Customer: Nahi isme aap karwaoge kya pehle mere ko yeh batao kyuki fir mere ko system mein baithna padega fir aap bataoge ki sir fir aisa kar do usme description change kar do usse thodi farak padega. Jab lead hi show nahi hogi to main lunga kya?

Executive: Sir matching bhi to check karaunga na main dobara se woh cheeze aapke confirmation pe. Product wise.

Customer: Nahi nahi confirmation, confirmation aap meri profile khol sakte ho theek hai aap khol ke usme waise bhi aapke paas uske paas aapke kya naam hai iske aap sign in to kar hi sakte ho. To usme check kar do uske andar mere ko aap past lead ke andar jaake check karo uske andar jo leads aayi hai.

Executive: Sir main char product hai. Maine charo ki aapki matching karai thi.

Customer: Nahi nahi char product to hai.

Customer: Are char product to zarur hai bilkul hai koi nahi lekin usme jo past lead ke andar jo show kar rahi hai woh aap keh rahe ho ki jo banda agar use kar raha hai to uske andar hat jati hai.

Executive: Sir woh past Vinod bhai pehle sun lijiye meri baat. Jo buylead aapka hota hai agar woh char se paanch seller uthate hai to woh sold out ho jata hai. Bas agar woh sold out category ke paas fir dikhai dega. Bas usko consume nahi kar sakte aap. Samajh gaye?

Customer: Nahi nahi woh yeh dikhayega dikhana to chahiye na, dikhana to chahiye.

Executive: Dikhega wohi to main bol raha hu. Consumption nahi. Haan to wohi to nahi dikh raha hai, wohi to nahi dikh raha hai. Na mere ko koi lead show kar rahi hai aap abhi bhi iske andar buyleads ke andar jaake check karo ek bhi mere ko ek ton ke upar ka order bata de to dikha do usme.

Executive: Sir ek ton ka agar nahi compost ka. Ek 5 ton ka bhi dikha raha hai order aapki.

Customer: Haan kahan par aapke show kar raha hai mere show nahi kar raha hai yeh batao.

Executive: Sir yeh wohi to bol raha hu jab video meet karenge na aapke sath.
Executive: Tabhi to aapko screen share karenge tabhi to dikha paunga na.

Customer: Nahi isme dekho isme check karo abhi iski history mein check karo.

Executive: Sir aisa nahi hota wohi main batane ki koshish kar raha hu mujhe kaise screen dikhega sir. Mere end se to dikh raha hai main wohi to bol raha hu aapka sold out category ke andar.

Customer: Ab dekho aisa hai ki

Executive: 10 minute ke liye aa jaiye main aapke resolution provide kara dunga aapko definitely. Aapko samajh aa jayega safal tarike se.

Customer: Haan ji theek hai chalo.

Executive: Schedule karu fir?

Customer: Bhejo bhejo aap. Gmail mein bhejo.

Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: Ji aisa nahi hai picture mein better hota hai.

Customer: Dekho maine dekho maine notice kiya hai aur maine suno maine notice bhi kiya aur maine to maine pichle ke hafte ki lead dekhi thi na kuch yeh theek hai iske pure mahine ki aap check kar lo kitni lead consume hai aur kya cheez hai. Isme ek bhi mere ko kaam ki lead mili nahi jiske andar main isko kya naam hai kisi ko bhi message karke ya isko buyer ko main contact kar saku.

Customer: To agar, agar aap keh rahe ho lead, lead hi show nahi ho rahi hai mere ko 50 kilo ki lead ka main karunga kya yeh batao.

Executive: Bilkul.

Customer: Jab maal, jab maal mere paas 50 ton, 100 ton mere paas maal aaj tayar uske andar to main 50 kilo ka karunga kya?

Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir.

Executive: Ek baar dekh lijiye.

Customer: Yeh dekho agar aisa hai ki aap se, agar aap se dekho agar aap se nahi ho raha to mere ko manager change karwa do.

Executive: Nahi aisa nahi hai sir woh main kara ke dunga don't worry.

Customer: Kyuki dekho are nahi mere ko notification ek bhi lead ka aaya nahi. Aap keh rahe ho ki woh sold out ho gayi, sold out tab hogi na jab logo ke paas message jata hai na. Ke haan aise lead aa gayi hai show ho rahi hai unke, unki feed ke andar bhi show ho rahi hai ki aisi lead aa rahi hai unke paas.

Executive: Sir ek baar aa jaiye fir waha discuss kar leta hu main video meet pe.

Customer: Dobara.

Executive: Check kijiye maine mail woh share kara aapko.

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan ji. Hello?

Executive: Theek hai fir main yaha se call disconnect kar dunga abhi system mein kare sir?

Customer: Haan haan system mein kare.

Executive: Theek hai system se main karunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Customer is not receiving lead notifications.

- Customer says leads disappear after someone takes them.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meet to showcase leads.

- Executive will check the customer's profile.

- Executive explained about sold out leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, notifications, video meet
